name: 2022 2nd International Conference on Power Electronics and Control Engineering
content: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by the conference scientific committees and accepted papers will be published in either one of the journals below based on their topics. - Journal of Automation and Control Engineering (ISSN: 2301-3702 (Print)), which is now abstracted and indexed by Google Scholar, Crossref, EBSCO and etc. - International Journal of Electronics and Electrical Engineering (ISSN: 2301-380X (Print)), which is now abstracted and indexed by Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, CNKI, etc.
